title: CONNECTION ERROR FIX
body:
Hey there summoners, This discussion will help people fix there league connection error because ive been there, just trying to find a fix for DAYS so im making this to help everyone in need but if anyone has a fix they would like to share please post it here. 
I had the same problem for the last couple of weeks but i found a solution to my problem so lets get started on how to fix your client shall we?

Fix: How i fixed mine was actually **very** as in very simple.
1. All u have to do is log on with a **different account**. (you can make a new account to log in with, just use a **different account**)
2. Exit that account
3. Log on to yours
4. You should be logged in.

This solution fixed mine and i hope it will fix yours if not, heres another fix that helped me once

Fix:
1. Open league of legends (opening as admin is optional)
2. On the top right corner you should see your server near there (eg, North America)
3. Click on your server and change it (I recommend Oceania if your in NA but any works)
4. let it update
5. after the update switch back to your original server 
6. Once you switch it back it may or may not update but let it update if it is updating (If it isnt updating than this may not work for you)
7. Once the update is done log on

Those are all my fixes, hope your problem was fixed! 
{{champion:64}} 

If this fixed your problem please post it in the comments thanks :D

Still having problems? Go here:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664

Have any questions? Please post them down below.
